/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from the middle of the street, looking towards the horizon. The sky above is a clear blue, with the sun shining brightly in the top right corner. The street itself is lined with trees and buildings on both sides, creating a corridor of urban life. In the distance, mountains can be seen, adding a touch of nature to the cityscape. The colors in the image are vibrant, with the green of the trees contrasting against the blue of the sky. The overall scene is a blend of urban and natural elements, typical of a city like Beijing.
